title: Reborn in the USA: Schumacher win that changed F1 history
summary: A turning point for Michael Schumacher, and for Formula 1 in America as well.Matt Bishopremembers the monumental weekend when the Indianapolis Motor Speedway hosted its first F1 grand prix

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is known for his pivotal win at the first Formula 1 Grand Prix held at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway?
In what year did the first Formula 1 Grand Prix take place at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway?
What impact did Michael Schumacher's victory at Indianapolis have on Formula 1 in America?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It marked a turning point in the popularity of F1 in the USA.
wrong_options: It led to the cancellation of future races.
It resulted in a decline in viewership.
